00073 template <class eltype>
00074 class YAATEReduce : public YADimReduce<eltype> {
00075  public:
00076   YAATEReduce();
00077 
00079   const string method_name() const {
00080   return "AutoEncoder"; }
00081   
00083   const string method_id() const {
00084   return "AE"; }
00085 
00087   const string version() const {
00088   return "0.1"; }
00089 
00091   void set_rng(MathRandom<MathMersenneTwister> *_rng) { rng=_rng; }
00092 
00094 
00097   int find(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &output, ya_sizet dim,
00098            EigenOptions &eigopts) {
00099     YA_DEBUG_ERROR1(this->ate_layers.numel()!=0 && 
00100                     dim==this->ate_layers.back(),
00101                     "Error specifying layers for autoencoder",
00102                     this->ate_layers);
00103     train(input,this->ate_layers,this->rbm_error,this->bp_error);
00104     forward_map(input,output);
00105     return 0;
00106   }
00108 
00112   int find(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &test, YA_MatT &output, 
00113            ya_sizet dim, EigenOptions &eigopts) {
00114     YA_DEBUG_ERROR1(this->ate_layers.numel()!=0 && 
00115                     dim==this->ate_layers.back(),
00116                     "Error specifying layers for autoencoder",
00117                     this->ate_layers);
00118     train(input,test,this->ate_layers,this->rbm_error,this->bp_error);
00119     forward_map(input,output);
00120     return 0;
00121   }
00123   void forward(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &output) const 
00124     { forward_map(input,output); }
00126   void reverse(const YA_MatT &input, YA_MatT &output) const 
00127     { reverse_map(input,output); }
00128

00130   using YADimReduce<eltype>::save_map;

00134   int load_map(istream &in);

00141     YA_RowT momentum;

00152   void train ( const vm_type &all_data, const ya_type2 &layers,
00153                ya_type3 &RBM_error, ya_type4 &BP_error );

00158   void train ( const vm_type &train_data, const ya_type2 &test_data,
00159                const ya_type3 &layers,
00160                ya_type4 &RBM_error, vm_type5 &BP_error );

00165   void train ( const vm_type &train_data, const ya_type2 &test_data,
00166                const ya_type3 &layers, const YA_Mat<conv_parms> &epsilon,
00167                ya_type4 &RBM_error, vm_type5 &BP_error );

00180   
00182   inline double train_split() const { return _train_split; }
00184   inline void train_split(double i) { _train_split=i; }
00186   inline ya_sizet rbm_iters() const { return _rbm_iters; }
00188   inline void rbm_iters(ya_sizet i) { _rbm_iters=i; }
00190   inline ya_sizet bp_iters() const { return _bp_iters; }
00192   inline void bp_iters(ya_sizet i) { _bp_iters=i; }
00194   inline ya_sizet rbm_size() const { return _des_rbm_size; }
00196   inline void rbm_size(ya_sizet i) { _des_rbm_size=i; }
00198   inline ya_sizet bp_size() const { return _des_bp_size; }
00200   inline void bp_size(ya_sizet i) { _des_bp_size=i; }
00201  
00202   // --------------- Options that are currently constants
00204   inline const string logistic_conv() const { return "[.1 .1 .1 .0002]"; }
00206   inline const string logistic_momentum() const { return "[.5 .9]"; }
00208   inline const string linear_conv() const { return "[.001 .001 .001 .0002]"; }
00210   inline const string linear_momentum() const { return "[.5 .9]"; }
00211  
00213 
00214   inline double momentum_denom() const { return 4; }
00216 
00217   inline ya_sizet num_ls() const { return 3; }
00218 
00220   inline eltype CG_EPS() const { return 2.2204E-16; }
00222   inline eltype CG_REALMIN() const { return 2.2251E-308; }
00223 
00224   // ----------------- parameters for optimization
00225   
00227   inline eltype cg_int() const { return 0.1; }
00229   inline eltype cg_ext() const { return 3.0; }
00231   inline ya_sizet cg_max() const { return 20; }
00233   inline eltype cg_ratio() const { return 10.0; }
00234   
00236 
00243   inline eltype cg_sig() const { return 0.1; }
00245 
00246   inline eltype cg_rho() const { return cg_sig()/2.0; }

00248  private:
00249   MathRandom<MathMersenneTwister> *rng;
00250     
00251   
00252   // This structure contains all the pertinent information for the AutoEncoder,
00253   // including weights, and biases.  This is needed for use by the back
00254   // propagation optimization functions, including minimize, update, and
00255   // cross_entropy.
00256   struct AE_Wb {
00257     YA_Mat<YA_MatT> weights; 
00258     YA_Mat<YA_MatT> biases;  
00259   };
00260 
00261   // ------------------------ AutoEncoder Options
00262   double _train_split;
00263   ya_sizet _rbm_iters;
00264   ya_sizet _bp_iters;
00265   ya_sizet _des_rbm_size;
00266   ya_sizet _des_bp_size;
00267   YA_Mat<conv_parms> _epsilon;
00268 
00269   // ------------------------ Forward and Reverse Maps
00270   YA_RowI layers;
00271   YA_Mat<YA_MatT> weights; 
00272   YA_Mat<YA_MatT> biases;
00273   // Data is scaled as: scaled_data = data*scale_times + scale_add;
00274   eltype scale_times;
00275   eltype scale_add; 
00276   
00277   // initialize AutoEncoder
00278   template <class vm_type>
00279   void init_Wb ( const vm_type &init_layers );
00280   
00281   // compute batch size nearest desired batch size:
00282   void compute_batch_size ( const ya_sizet N );
00283 
00284   // trains all RBMs
00285   template <class vm_type, class ya_type2>
00286   void train_RBMs ( const vm_type &train_data, ya_type2 &RBM_error );
00287   
00288   // back propagation
00289   template <class vm_type, class ya_type2, class ya_type3>
00290   void back_prop ( const vm_type &train_data, const ya_type2 &test_data,
00291                    ya_type3 &BP_error);
00292 
00293   // conjugate gradient line search
00294   template <class vm_type>
00295   void minimize ( const vm_type &curr_data );
00296 
00297   // compute vectorized dot product of X and Y
00298   eltype dot_Wb ( const AE_Wb &X, const AE_Wb &Y );
00299   
00300   // compute cross entropy and derivatives using back propagation
00301   template <class vm_type>
00302   void cross_entropy ( eltype &CE_err, AE_Wb &dWb, const AE_Wb &Wb,
00303                        const vm_type &curr_data );
00304 };
